name: oc-htop
description: Advanced system monitor for OpenComputers inspired by htop
author: B4DCAT
long_description: oc-htop is a powerful system monitoring tool for OpenComputers that provides real-time information about system resources and running processes. Features include: memory usage monitoring, energy consumption tracking, disk space visualization, process list with sorting options, interactive controls for navigation, and a beautiful color-coded interface. Perfect for system administrators and users who need to monitor their OpenComputers systems.

changelog.1.0.0: Initial release with full htop-like functionality
